title: Console Log Filtering Implementation
content:
Implemented dual-filter logging system for v1.6.0.8:
- Live console filtering: Controls what appears in browser console in real-time using async category checks before console.log() calls
- Export filtering: Filters logs during .txt export based on separate settings
- 16 categories organized into 3 groups: User Actions (6), System Operations (7), Diagnostics (3)
- Storage: browser.storage.local with cache for performance
- UI: Collapsible accordion groups in popup Advanced tab using CSS checkbox pattern
- Defaults: Noisy categories (hover, url-detection) disabled in live console; all enabled for export
- Key files: src/utils/logger.js (new), src/utils/debug.js (modified), popup.html, popup.js
